headline: Cloudflare mitigates record-breaking 71 million request-per-second DDoS attack
keywords: Attacks, Trends, Speed & Reliability, Security, DDoS, Botnet
description: This was a weekend of record-breaking DDoS attacks. Over the weekend, Cloudflare detected and mitigated dozens of hyper-volumetric DDoS attacks. The majority of attacks peaked in the ballpark of 50-70 million requests per second (rps) with the largest exceeding 71 million rps
